title: Lambda with data compression
description: Use data compression to send larger payloads and reduce data transfer costs

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample project demonstrates how to use data compression with AWS Lambda functions to reduce data transfer costs and send/receive payloads larger than 6MB
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
